content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To assist you with your plumbing needs, may I please have your name?
I don't really want to share my name. Can we just get to the point?
I understand. Unfortunately, to proceed with scheduling your plumbing service, I need to have a name on the booking. Could you please provide it?
No, I prefer not to. I just want the service.
Iâ€™m sorry, but without your name, I cannot proceed with scheduling this appointment. If you change your mind, please let us know. Thank you for understanding.
